german_content.short_description: Errichte in Factorio deine eigene Fabrik, um einfachste Elemente zu raffinierten Strukturen zu kombinieren. Nutze deine Fantasie in einer unendlichen 2D-Welt und verteidige deine Fabrik gegen die Kreaturen, die dir deinen Fortschritt nicht gönnen.

english_content.short_description: Factorio is a game about building and creating automated factories to produce items of increasing complexity, within an infinite 2D world. Use your imagination to design your factory, combine simple elements into ingenious structures, and finally protect it from the creatures who don't really like you.
